title: Leopard, Ram, and Jackal
description: This delightful African fable tells how fierce Leopard is actually afraid of mild Ram. Jackal tries to force his friend to be brave and face Ram. But Ram's wife tricks Leopard, and Jackal ends up paying the price in this humorous tale.
reviewWords: bruised, dragging, fierce, foolish, gruff, hunter, jerked, juicy, leaped, meekly
comprehension: Sequence Events                : Sequence events in a story
awareness: Long Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate long vowel /e/ sound
phonics: Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraphs ea and ee
grammar: Quotation Marks                : Recognize and understand the use of quotation marks
wordWork: Synonyms                : Identify words that mean the same (synonyms)
